biotools.summary:
A scalable and reproducible data processing and analysis pipeline for metatranscriptomic investigation of microbial communities.

MetaPro: Meta-analysis pipeline for Transcriptomics + Genomics.

The MetaPro Meta Transcriptomics/Genomics Pipeline is a software tool that will perform Transcriptomics and Genomic analysis on Paired and Single Reads of FASTQ data.

bioschemas.name: MetaPro
